content: What do you need people to already know, to moderate. Do you train? How much time per day or week do you need us to put in? Do we need audio and video?

Hi <@911700060360818688> thanks for reaching out to share your interest in moderating. Each team has moderators, and there are moderators for the general chat channels. If you want to join call-mod, text-mod, etc. reach out to that team, they will give you the details. If you want to apply for general chat moderator, I'll connect you with Staff. The role includes training, shadowing, and the expectation is at least 3x 2 hour shifts a week during peek hours.
Hi <@568257600228032512> - can you elaborate on how you reach out to a team without having access to those channels? I was a back end text mod in 2020 and was hoping to do it again
Hi Elena, post a question in <#1266829704204386334> letting them know you're interested and they should be able to point you in the right direction!
